scripts.renameExtensions: for f in *.js; do mv $f `basename $f .js`.mjs; done
scripts.build: tsc --target es6 populator.ts ; sed -i'.bak' -e '/require\(.*interfaces\/.*\)/d' ../clientAPI.js && sed -i'.bak' -e '/import.*interfaces\/.*/d' ../clientAPI.js ; rm ../clientAPI.js.bak ; sed -i'.bak' -e '/require\(.*interfaces\/.*\)/d' populator.js && sed -i'.bak' -e '/import.*interfaces\/.*/d' populator.js ; rm populator.js.bak && npm run renameExtensions
